alert.note: Alert for Dubuque (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Dubuque County through 600 PM CDT... At 500 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Holy Cross, or 10 miles south of Guttenberg, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could cause minor tree limb damage and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Holy Cross, Luxemburg, Sherrill, Balltown, Waupeton, Mud Lake Park, and Finley`s Landing Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
